content: decrease double_crochet 1 around double_crochet in last st slip_stitch into 1st st to join 30 double_crochet 16 chain 2 skip 1 st double_crochet 2 decrease double_crochet in skip st around until 2 st remain end with skip 1 st double_crochet 1 double_crochet in skip st slip_stitch into 1st st to join 20 double_crochet 17 chain 1 decrease around 10 single_crochet finishing fasten_off leaving long tail for sewing sew hole at top of hat closed using yarn tail weave in ends crossing paths hat 3
